title: River Town
description: Deep in the North Florida woods, far from the modern world, a Doctor and his teenage daughter try to make a new home. What they find in the process is more than either had bargained for.Dr. Jay Mendenhol is eager to take over his new practice. Heâ€™d had enough of the South florida corporate medical world and was looking forward to a quieter, more peaceful lifestyle.Sarah Mendenhol, a precocious fifteen year old, was already missing Miami when the two moved into their new home in River Town.As a series of events transpire, both are caught in the middle of a divided community. Through persecution, trial and vindication the two stick together as they fight for what is right, and , in the end, their lives.
author: T. Rafael Cimino
